name: dropdown-select
title: Dropdown Select
description: Dropdown select allows to select an item from the list and update the model.

options.name: model
options.description: A result of the selection. Can return object (see return-object attribute).

options.name: position
options.description: Vertical position of the dropdown list against the dropdown button. It becomes handy when dropdown floats to the right.

options.name: default-text
options.description: Default text shown before selection is made.

options.name: force-default
options.description: Force default text to be always shown, if set to true.

options.name: return-object
options.description: If set to true, a full object will be returned in the model. By default only value is returned.

options.name: disabled
options.description: Make button look inactive by adding the disabled boolean attribute.
